A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The last Jedi is beautifully shot and the acting is great\, the fights are cool and that's about all I can say I liked about this movie. Tlj takes a big dump on tfa and the ot. It makes Luke into a creepy uncle and cowered who just wants to die. He isn't Luke from the ot. They throw away seeds that jj abrams planted in tfa and the movie feels like it has no purpose.
